title: Kaali Khuhi
writer: Rupinder Inderjit, David Walter Lech, Terrie Samundra
short_cast: Shabana Azmi, Leela Samson, Sanjeeda Sheikh, Satyadeep Misra, Riva Arora, Hetvi Bhanushali, Rose Rathod
cast: Shabana Azmi, Leela Samson, Sanjeeda Sheikh, Satyadeep Misra, Riva Arora, Hetvi Bhanushali, Rose Rathod
genre: Social Issue Dramas, Hindi-Language Movies, Horror Movies

desc: When a restless spirit curses a village that has a history of female infanticide, the town's fate lies in the hands of a 10-year-old girl.
